column1: Well, well, well! If it isn't Robin Hood and his Merry Men!
Whatcha got there?
Lord of the Rings? Ha! That movie's gay!
What the--?  Whoa!  Check it out, you guys!
No way! We're keepin' this and watchin' it ourselves!
And what are three little fourth graders gonna do about it, huh?!
Oh man, I can't wait to see this!
Get 'em!
I smell fourth graders!
Alright, everybody listen up! There's three snot-nosed little fourth graders out there who have a porno called Backdoor Sluts 9.
I checked it out on the Internet, and it said that Backdoor Sluts 9 is the most hard-core porno ever made.
I have amassed this army of sixth graders to get the tape by any means necessary. Now, let's go get that porno!
Fourth graders! Give us that porn-o!
What the hell is wrong with you guys?! Get the tape!
Oh, god-damnit. Alright, come on. We'll find a bridge.
There they are!
There it is! Give me that tape!
Nooo!  No, nooo!  Damnit!
You stupid little fourth graders!
Yeah? Well, that's not gonna stop us from kicking your asses!
Crap! Parents!  Come on, guys.  We'll see you next time, fourthies!
I'm gonna jump the wall of fire.  Yeah, that was sweet!
Omigod!
I'm taking them to the bushes!
